short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ADD BALANCE to TikTok Agency Account using Marketize Studio's extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Marketize Studio - ADD BALANCE to TikTok Agency Account

DIRECT TOP-UP / SELF TOP-UP/ ADD BALANCE  IN TIKTOK AD S AGENCY ACCOUNT

Convert Any ad account to self deposit:
A tool for generating top-up links for TikTok advertising accounts. Easily retrieve your advertising account data.

Any Agency ad accounts are supported:
Marketize Studio
Ecomdy media
Mil MEDIA
GNA
GWM
Mega Digital
Next Tech

Features:
1. Export cookies, id and name tiktok advertising account
2. Display TikTok advertising account information
3. Generate top-up links using cookies|

Cookie data of the tiktok advertising account will be collected by us. By installing this application you agree to our privacy terms

Website: https://marketizestudio.com

Email: support@marketizestudio.com
